その都度: (そのつど) - each time it happens; at all such times
その際: (そのさい) - in so doing; when you do so; in this regard; on this occasion; some time during that period
その頃: (sonokoro) - naquela época, naqueles dias, naquele momento, então
そば切: (そばきり) - soba; Japanese buckwheat noodles
そば切り: (そばきり) - soba; Japanese buckwheat noodles
そば杖: (そばづえ) - blow received by a bystander; getting dragged in to somebody else's fight
そば飯: (そばめし) - soba and rice cooked together along with meat, vegetables, etc. on a metal plate
そびえ立つ: (そびえたつ) - to stand towering over the surrounds
そびれる: (そびれる) - (usu. a suffix after the -masu stem of a verb) to miss a chance; to fail to do
そぼろ: (そぼろ) - minced meat or fish with soy sauce, etc. (served on rice); shred (e.g. old clothing falling apart)/tangle (objects twisted together)/thin slices (esp. food)
そよそよ: (そよそよ) - breeze (sound representing a soft wind)
そよ風: (そよかぜ) - gentle breeze; soft wind; breath of air; zephyr
そら: (そら) - look!/look out!/look at me!/here!/there!; that is
そらで歌う: (そらでうたう) - to sing from memory
そらで覚える: (そらでおぼえる) - to learn by heart (rote); to memorize; to memorise
そらで言う: (そらでいう) - to speak from memory
そら来た: (そらきた) - there it is; there it comes; got it; of course; it figures; I knew it; expression one says when what is expected comes
そら耳: (そらみみ) - mishearing; (feigned) deafness; homophonic translation of song lyrics for comic effect
そら豆: (soramame) - broad bean (Fava), horse bean, fava bean
そりが合わない: (そりがあわない) - unable to cooperate; unable to hit it off
そり舌音: (そりじたおん) - retroflex; retroflex consonant; retroflex sound
それ: (それ) - there! (used to call someone's attention to something)
それかあらぬか: (それかあらぬか) - I don't know for certain, but ...; I don't know if that's the reason, but ...
それからというもの: (それからというもの) - after that (a substantive change occurred)
それが: (それが) - (subject of sentence) that/it; (in response to a question) well yes, actually, now that you mention it/well, in fact
それこそ: (それこそ) - degree or extent (of effect or result)
それご覧: (それごらん) - Well, look at that... (used when someone ignores your advice and ultimately fails at something)
それだから: (それだから) - therefore; and so; for that reason; accordingly; consequently; hence
それだけの価値がある: (それだけのかちがある) - to be deserved; to be worth it; to have merit; to have value
それっぽい: (それっぽい) - like that; looks real; seems authentic
それっぽっち: (それっぽっち) - so little; so few; so trifling; so small
それっ切り: (それっきり) - (stronger version of それきり)  no more than that/with that/on that note/altogether; since then/ending there
それでいて: (soredeite) - e ainda assim, apesar (de tudo) isso
それとて: (それとて) - even so; even that
それと分かる: (それとわかる) - detectable; noticeable; recognizable; observable
それどころじゃない: (それどころではない) - that's out of the question; it's just not possible
それどころではない: (それどころではない) - that's out of the question; it's just not possible
それなのに: (sorenanoni) - e ainda assim, apesar disso, mas mesmo assim, mas mesmo então, porém, no entanto, apesar de tudo, não obstante isso
それならそうと: (それならそうと) - even so (expressing frustration, etc.); still
それならそれで: (それならそれで) - even so (expressing frustration, etc.); still
それにしても: (sorenishitemo) - no entanto, de qualquer forma, mesmo assim, considerando tudo, seja como for
それにも拘わらず: (それにもかかわらず) - nonetheless; nevertheless
それに加えて: (それにくわえて) - in addition to this
それに引き替えて: (それにひきかえて) - in contrast; on the contrary; on the other hand
それはさておき: (それはさておき) - apart from that; to return to the topic; enough of that
それはそれで: (それはそれで) - in that case; (might not be what was expected or hoped for but) if that's the case
それはそれは: (それはそれは) - My goodness (expresses surprise, wonder, etc.); very/extremely
それはどうかな: (それはどうかな) - I wonder about that; don't bet on it; famous last words
それはどうも: (それはどうも) - why yes, thank you
それも: (それも) - and in addition to that; even so
それより: (それより) - apart from that; other than that; leaving that aside; more ... than that; but; however
それ以上: (それいじょう) - further; above; anymore
それ以外のものは: (それいがいのものは) - aside from this; aside from these
それ以来: (それいらい) - since then; from that time; ever since
それ処か: (それどころか) - on the contrary
それ切り: (それぎり) - with that; on that note; altogether; ending at that point; cut off there
それ式: (それしき) - trivial; insignificant; meager; meagre; that little amount; such a small extent
それ御覧: (それごらん) - Well, look at that... (used when someone ignores your advice and ultimately fails at something)
それ故: (それゆえ) - therefore; for that reason; so
それ来た: (それきた) - there it is; there it comes; got it; of course; it figures; I knew it; expression one says when what is expected comes
それ相応: (それそうおう) - appropriate; suitable; proper; fitting
それ程: (sorehodo) - a esse ponto, a tal grau, tanto assim
それ自体: (それじたい) - in itself; the thing itself; this itself; for its own sake; per se
それ見たことか: (それみたことか) - You see that? (used when someone ignores your advice and ultimately fails at something)
それ見た事か: (それみたことか) - I told you so
それ見ろ: (それみろ) - Well, look at that... (used when someone ignores your advice and ultimately fails at something)
それ計り: (そればかり) - that much; as much; to that extent; only that; that alone; no more than that
それ迄: (それまで) - until then/till then/up to that time; to that extent; the end of it/all there is to it
そろい踏み: (そろいぶみ) - {sumo} ritual stamping in the ring; lineup/appearance together
そろそろ: (sorosoro) - lentamente, silenciosamente, firmemente, gradualmente, cautelosamente; em breve, momentaneamente, antes de muito tempo, a qualquer momento
そろっと: (そろっと) - (そろそろ only) slowly/quietly/steadily/gradually/gingerly; soon/momentarily/before long/any time now
そわそわ: (そわそわ) - fidgety; restless; nervous; uneasy
そんじょそこら: (そんじょそこら) - anywhere/here and there; common/run-of-the-mill/ordinary
そんだけ: (そんだけ) - only that; that's all (used in casual speech)
